Application.Name: Google Earth Pro
Application.Description: Google Earth Pro on desktop is free for users with advanced feature needs. Import and export GIS data, and go back in time with historical imagery. Available on PC, Mac, or Linux. Free Software.

Download.DownloadVersionCheck: Start-Process $TempDir\GoogleEarthProInstallerx64.exe -ArgumentList "OMAHA=1" -wait $MSIFiles = Get-ChildItem C:\Windows\Installer | where name -like "*.msi" | Sort-Object -Property LastWriteTime -Descending foreach ($MSI in $MSIFiles){ if ($(Get-MSIInfo -Path $MSI.FullName -Property ProductName) -eq "Google Earth Pro"){ Write-Verbose "Google Earth Pro Found!" $MSIFileName = $MSI.FullName $MSIProductCode = Get-MSIInfo -Path $MSI.FullName -Property ProductCode $Version = ([string](Get-MSIInfo -Path $MSI.FullName -Property ProductVersion)).TrimStart().TrimEnd() break } } write-host $MSIFileName $Version $DestinationPath\GoogleEarthProInstallerx64.msi Copy-Item $MSIFileName -Destination $TempDir\GoogleEarthProInstallerx64.msi -force Start-Process msiexec.exe -ArgumentList "/x$MSIProductCode /qn" -wait

Start-Process $TempDir\GoogleEarthProInstallerx86.exe -ArgumentList "OMAHA=1" -wait $MSIFiles = Get-ChildItem C:\Windows\Installer | where name -like "*.msi" | Sort-Object -Property LastWriteTime -Descending foreach ($MSI in $MSIFiles){ if ($(Get-MSIInfo -Path $MSI.FullName -Property ProductName) -eq "Google Earth Pro"){ Write-Host "Google Earth Pro Found!" $MSIFileName = $MSI.FullName $MSIProductCode = Get-MSIInfo -Path $MSI.FullName -Property ProductCode $Version = ([string](Get-MSIInfo -Path $MSI.FullName -Property ProductVersion)).TrimStart().TrimEnd() break } } write-host $MSIFileName $Version Copy-Item $MSIFileName -Destination "$TempDir\GoogleEarthProInstallerx86.msi" -force Start-Process msiexec.exe -ArgumentList "/x$MSIProductCode /qn" -wait

DeploymentType.Name: DeploymentType1
DeploymentType.DeploymentTypeName: Google Earth Pro Silent Install x64
DeploymentType.Comments: Silent Installer for Google Earth Pro

DeploymentType.Name: DeploymentType2
DeploymentType.DeploymentTypeName: Google Earth Pro Silent Install x86
DeploymentType.Comments: Silent Installer for Google Earth Pro
